snippet.title: The Little Brave  - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
#indiegame #metroidvania #platformer #gaming #madewithunity

BE BRAVE PLAY THE DEMO ON STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724300/The_Little_Brave

Undertake a dangerous journey into mysterious forbidden lands to reveal secrets of the legendary past, find the last pieces of gone magic, and gain bravery on your path in this exciting adventure of the cute little hero.

Trailer music: https://www.jonhickmanmusic.co.uk

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724300/The_Little_Brave
Website: https://thelittlebrave.games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LittleBraveGame
